TLDR Review Bites

While we want to encourage people to write their own reviews, we don't expect other users to read pages of reviews to see if the book is for them. For this reason, we have a TLDR Review Bites feature! Once you have rated this book, write a sentence or two about why you like this book, and what kinds of readers would enjoy this book. Refrain from repeating others, as we want to keep this as compact as possible! If somebody has already written your idea, upvote it so more people can see it! You can write what you think in your own words in teh full reviews section :).

Note: Don't take downvotes personally! When upvoting/downvoting somebody, don't do this based on how much you agree with them but rather, whether others who chose the same amount of stars have already mentioned it or if it wouldn't be helpful to others.
Another Note: Please do not have spoilers. Lots of people who haven't read the book are going to be reading what you write. If you find another TLDR Bite that has spoilers, please downvote so less people will see it.
